title: Tension With Your Teen
itunes:author: Guest: Rhonda Stoppe
itunes:summary:
As your child becomes a teenager, it's very common for him or her to pull away, which can lead to a lot of tension in the relationship. In this discussion, you'll hear about how boys tend to pull away from their mothers, and John and Danny share about how fathers can connect with a teen daughter as she becomes more independent. Featuring Rhonda Stoppe.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Rhonda Stoppe's book "Moms Raising Sons to be Men" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-11-16?refcd=1311602

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/tension-with-your-teen/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
